XRP กำลังจะประสบความสำเร็จ? CEO ของ Ripple Prime เผยว่ามีการพัฒนาใหญ่หลังการผนึกกำลัง

XRP Set for Lift Off? Ripple Prime CEO Hints at Big Developments After Integration

1d ago//Tomiwabold Olajide
altcoins
AI

Summary

TH

Ripple Prime International CEO Mike Higgins แสดงความกระตือรือร้นเกี่ยวกับการรวมระบบล่าสุดกับ Hyperliquid ซึ่งเป็นแพลตฟอร์ม derivatives แบบกระจายอำนาจ การเคลื่อนไหวนี้ช่วยให้ลูกค้าสถาบันสามารถเข้าถึงสภาพคล่องของ on-chain derivatives และใช้ cross-margin สำหรับสินทรัพย์ crypto รวมถึง XRP กับคลาสสินทรัพย์อื่นๆ ผ่านคู่สัญญาเดียว Higgins มองว่าการผนวกตลาดเงินทุนนี้เป็นก้าวสำคัญสำหรับสถาบันที่จะเข้าสู่ on-chain economy ในข่าวที่เกี่ยวข้อง Ripple จะจัดกิจกรรม X Spaces สดระหว่างวันที่ 11-12 กุมภาพันธ์ 2026 เพื่อพูดคุยเกี่ยวกับ XRP utility และทิศทางการนำไปใช้งาน โดยจะมี David Schwartz ผู้ร่วมสร้าง XRP Ledger เข้าร่วมแบ่งปันมุมมอง นอกจากนี้ Ripple ยังบรรลุเป้าหมายทางกฎระเบียบในครั้งสำคัญด้วยการได้รับใบอนุญาต EU Electronic Money Institution (EMI) เต็มรูปแบบแล้ว

EN

Ripple Prime International CEO Mike Higgins expressed optimism regarding the recent integration with Hyperliquid, a decentralized derivatives venue. This collaboration allows institutional clients to access on-chain derivatives liquidity and cross-margin crypto assets, including XRP, with other asset classes through a single counterparty. Higgins views this capital markets integration as a pivotal step for institutions entering the on-chain economy. In related news, Ripple announced it will host live X Spaces events from February 11 to 12, 2026, featuring CTO Emeritus David Schwartz to discuss XRP utility and future adoption. Additionally, Ripple achieved a significant regulatory milestone by securing a full EU Electronic Money Institution license in Luxembourg.

Key Points

  • Ripple Prime enables support for Hyperliquid, allowing institutions to access on-chain derivatives liquidity.
  • Clients can now cross-margin crypto assets like XRP with other supported asset classes on the platform.
  • Ripple will host live X Spaces events in February 2026 to discuss XRP utility with David Schwartz.
  • Ripple has been granted a full EU EMI license in Luxembourg.

Ripple Prime International CEO Mike Higgins shares his excitement about the latest integration of Hyperliquid, a leading decentralized derivatives venue. Yesterday, Ripple announced that Ripple Prime , its institutional prime brokerage platform, has enabled support for Hyperliquid. The next phase of institutions joining the onchain economy starts with capital markets integration – and @HyperliquidX – one of the fastest growing, most liquid venues for crypto price discovery and onchain derivatives, is an obvious place to start. From XRP and other crypto… https://t.co/nf60Cb8L3Q?from=article-links — Mike Higgins (@mikehiggins) February 4, 2026 According to Mike Higgins , the next phase of institutions joining the on-chain economy starts with capital markets' integration and the integration of HyperliquidX, a liquid venue for crypto price discovery and on-chain derivatives remains an obvious place to start. You Might Also Like HOT Stories The move enables institutions to access on-chain derivatives liquidity through HyperliquidX; Ripple Prime customers can also cross-margin crypto with all asset classes supported by the prime brokerage platform, which includes XRP. Higgins signals benefits for XRP amid the latest Hyperliquid integration, saying, "From XRP and other crypto assets to heavy metals perps.I’m incredibly excited for Ripple Prime clients to be able to tap into this liquidity through a single, secure counterparty." Ripple and XRP news For two days in the month of February, XRP holders, builders, institutions and Ripple leaders will come together across three live X Spaces to discuss XRP utility and where it is headed next. From Feb. 11 to 12, 2026, Ripple will be hosting three live X Spaces, covering EMEA, the Americas and APAC regions. You Might Also Like In one of the segments of the event, "Looking Ahead with David Schwartz" scheduled for Feb. 12, Ripple CTO emeritus and co-creator of the XRP Ledger, David Schwartz, will be taking questions from the XRP community as well as sharing his perspective on how XRP use cases have evolved, what matters most for adoption and where real progress is happening. This week, in a major milestone, Ripple has been granted a full EU EMI license after previously receiving preliminary approval for its EU Electronic Money Institution license in Luxembourg.
